title: Why don't marksmen have some kind of real gating on their damage like assassins are getting?
body:
Marksmen auto and can do crits one after another resulting in thousands of damage in under 3 seconds which is the kind of thing assassins are getting nerfed to have limited. This in turn means marksmen can often kill assassins before the assassin can kill them at many parts of the game especially with even the smallest of CC or escape mechanic of a marksmen.

Why don't marksmen have some kind of wind up factor built in their kits making their up front burst a joke but their sustained DPS godly which is what they are suppose to be good for in a fight? We have some things like this in Fervor and rageblade in the game  as examples of how it would work. Why is something like this not the limiting factor of a class that is getting it's counters limited?

Heck you even kinda see this in Jinx's kit with her Q getting more attack speed.

This isn't really fair.

ADC is a position, like mid lane, top, jungle, or support. Whereas mages, tanks, and assassins are roles.

My example:
How many teams did you see with no mid laner? None
How many teams did you see with no support? None
How many teams did you see with no top laner? None
How many teams did you see with no jungler? None

Assassins arent losing their burst. Riot said since the start of this that the goal was to give people ~1 second of extra counterplay. All of these reworks have the exact same burst potential (except maybe rengar, but lets be real. 1400 damage Q's right out of stealth were not fun to play against). The only difference is that 20% of their damage takes an extra second to activate, meaning if they jump on you, you have 1-1.5 extra seconds to live. Even rengar, with the ferocity changes, can still build to full ferocity in 1 spell rotation and a leap, which only gates his power for 1 second.

Talon: passive. 1 spell rotation and an AA procs it. Takes about 1.5 seconds due to his attack speed animation.

Katarina: more spinning than before, but ahe has to wait for dagger drops now.

Leblanc: literally the same kit, except extra burst was added to her passive after a 1.5 second delay. All abilities can apply and proc the mark.

Rengar: ferocity can only be built in combat, but he no longer has to wait around for 2 spells to come off CD to fill an empty bar. His ult now lets people know he's coming for them more clearly.

All of these assassins can still output the damage to consistently kill marksman, just like before. Now marksman get 1 extra second to react. God forbid marksman should have time to use an ability to get away from you to prevent the last 20% of your damage from killing them.
